mapper.select: SELECT a.one_id,a.one_title,d.m_nickname,a.one_type FROM and_one a, c_member b, one_member c, member d WHERE a.one_id = c.one_id AND c.m_id = b.m_id AND b.c_id = #{c_id} AND b.cm_rank in (10,20,30) AND c.om_leader = '10' AND d.m_id = b.m_id AND SUBSTR(one_time,1,10) = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM club a, c_member b WHERE c_category like #{c_category} AND a.c_id = b.c_id AND b.cm_rank = '10'
AND a.c_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.m_id LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT c.ca_id,a.car_id,a.car_content,b.m_nickname,b.m_img,b.m_id, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(a.car_date,1,10) = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN SUBSTR(a.car_date,12,16) ELSE a.car_date END) as car_date FROM ca_reply a, member b, ca_reply c WHERE a.m_id = b.m_id AND c.car_id = a.p_car_id AND a.p_car_id = #{c_id} ORDER BY a.car_date asc

SELECT a.ca_id,a.car_id,a.car_content,b.m_nickname,b.m_img,b.m_id, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(a.car_date,1,10) = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN SUBSTR(a.car_date,12,16) ELSE a.car_date END) as car_date FROM ca_reply a, member b WHERE a.ca_id = #{c_id} AND a.m_id = b.m_id AND a.p_car_id IS NULL ORDER BY a.car_date asc

SELECT b.c_name,b.c_content,b.c_membercnt,b.c_id,b.c_img, (select c.gc_name from club a, common_code c where a.c_category= c.gc_id and c.g_id = '019' and b.c_id = a.c_id) as c_category from (select * from club order by c_membercnt desc) b where rownum between 1 and 6
SELECT a.c_name,a.c_membercnt,a.c_id,a.c_img from club a, c_member b where a.c_id = b.c_id and m_id=#{m_id} and cm_rank in (10,20,30)
SELECT gc_name as c_category FROM common_code WHERE g_id ='019' AND gc_id =#{c_category}

select c_name,c_content,replace(c_hashtag,',','#') as c_hashtag,c_membercnt,gc_name as c_category,c_id,c_img from ( select * from common_code a inner join club b on a.gc_id = b.c_category where g_id=019 ) where c_hashtag like #{searchWord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( select * from common_code a inner join club b on a.gc_id = b.c_category where g_id=019 ) where c_hashtag like #{searchWord}

select c_name,c_content,replace(c_hashtag,',','#') as c_hashtag,c_membercnt,gc_name as c_category,c_id,SUBSTR(c_openingdate,1,10) as c_openingdate,c_membermax,c_img,c_ask from ( select * from common_code a inner join club b on a.gc_id = b.c_category where g_id=019 ) where c_id = #{c_id}

select c_name,c_content,replace(c_hashtag,',','#') as c_hashtag,c_membercnt,gc_name as c_category,c_id,c_openingdate,c_img from ( select * from common_code a inner join club b on a.gc_id = b.c_category where g_id=019 ) where c_id = #{c_id}

SELECT a.ca_content,b.m_nickname,a.ca_img,a.ca_id,a.ca_pin,b.m_img,a.m_id, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(a.ca_date,1,10) = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN SUBSTR(a.ca_date,12,16) ELSE a.ca_date END) as ca_date FROM c_article a, member b WHERE a.m_id = b.m_id AND a.c_id = #{c_id} ORDER BY a.ca_pin DESC, a.ca_date DESC
select a.m_img from member a, c_member b where a.m_id = b.m_id and cm_rank = 10 and c_id = #{c_id}
SELECT a.m_img FROM member a, (select * from c_member order by cm_joindate desc) b WHERE a.m_id = b.m_id AND cm_rank in (20,30) AND c_id = #{c_id} AND rownum between 1 and 15
